website_summaries.verdict: This all-metal lock is equal parts strong, loud, and secure.
pros: Anchored by a durable 7-millimeter pin, this product by Yohoolyo locks at 360 degrees for maximum peace of mind on nearly any motorcycle
The alarm is intense at 110 decibels, and is triggered by vibration or shock
Anti-corrosive exterior stands up to weather well, and the product includes 2 keys
cons: Severe wind can set off the alarm if left outside, so the sensitivity may be too high

website_summaries.verdict: A good alternative disc brake lock to consider when you need more protection than budget options offer.
pros: Metal casing is rated to resist most common hand and power tools used for vehicle theft
Exterior will prevent rusting during long periods of use
cons: The motion-activated alarm can go off when using the key to unlock the device

customer_reviews.title: Great deterrent both visually and audibly.
customer_reviews.text: Most of these style locks don't make any noise. As soon as you move the lock or the bike this thing gives a warning "chirp chirp chirp". If you move it again, it's loud! If the thief tried to keep stealing your bike he would have to put up with a blaring siren. Plus all the attention the noise would draw. I was concerned someone could just pop the batteries out. No way before it went off though. Some people said it is too sensitive. My bike is under a cover and I've never had it go off, even in storms/windy weather. Also, awesome feature, if you forget to take it off before riding, it'll remind you!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money but could be loader
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as I thought it would be. I'll but in new batteries and see if that helps. Well built and fits my bike,aVTX1800. I'm putting it on the back wheel [ it's a little harder to reach] but I've seen how easily 2 men and a 2x4 can lift the front of a locked bike and walk it away. I just got a nice letter from the seller [5/25/17] saying that they would pay for new batteries. This was really great treatment and very unexpected. The batteries did work and since low batteries are normal ware this can't be held against the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Alarm Feature
customer_reviews.text: This lock is great if you simply use it without motion detection (take the batteries out). The sensor is WAY too sensitive. On a sunny day, little to no wind - it works great. Raining? Windy? You'll hear some blaring alarm sounds. I'd say 5 stars for a standard lock and 2 stars for the alarm. Excellent customer service bumps the total rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: LOUD, SENSITIVE, DURABLE, and AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints at all with this device. You should get an insurance discount, though small, for owning one, it is CRAZY loud for being so small, very sensitive ( I forgot I put it on one night and just by tilting my bike upward from it's kickstand position it went off and scared the @#$! out of me ), very affordable, and with all that it's DURABLE being made entirely out of metal. I wouldn't take my Ninja anywhere without it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I haven't had to put this thing to the test. But it gives me GREAT security knowing that if someone is fool enough to mess with my bike I will hear it. I have set it off to hear the chirp but not the full on siren. This is mainly just an extra level of deterrent while my bike is parked in front of my house. We have had some stormy days and the alarm has not set off which is great. So the sensitivity isn't on HIGH. As far a lock feature I would still use a heavy duty lock. This is on the back wheel so that its not messed with.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynDodger

customer_reviews.title: Fits the ATM-50A1
customer_reviews.text: This and my chain lock keeps the thieves at bay. My pops always said that "a lock only keeps honest folk honest. Fits the ATM-50A1 or VIP scooter perfectly once you figure out the right place for it. It should be at the 6 o'clock position. Alarm is not that loud, but loud enough to make one look.
customer_reviews.author: Mile Hi Dave

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 2017 XL883N (Sportster Iron) and it works great. Locking side fits into the vents in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2017 XL883N (Sportster Iron) and it works great. Locking side fits into the vents in the disc brake. It's a bit touchy and I hesitate to use it when I know the bike will be in locations where loud vehicles or other bikes will be going by constantly. I can set it off by setting my helmet on the seat of the bike, if that's a good indicator. Would buy again and save the money vs. the $70 one I was looking at previously.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Moore

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it is not as sensitive as I read in a few other reviews. Wind does not Set It Off I am satisfied with the purchase. To me this is a device to be used where people are present all the time, I would not use this on my bicycle somewhere that there is not immediate presence of people that should be a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: clay selvia

customer_reviews.title: Functional Lock I Trust
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid lock, I trust it. The only problem I’ve had is that sometimes depending on how it’s sitting basically the wind can set the alarm off. Other than that good lock never the less.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for only a short time
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for both of our scooters. The disc alarm idea is great and this one was loud. But after a few weeks and a some rainy days, both stopped working. When it was raining, my husband's was going off constantly but thankfully, mine wasn't as sensitive. Then mine stopped working, even after replacing the battery. My husband's doesn't work at all except for constant clicking. Also, we never received the cable or storage box with it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Case of the Fragile Lock Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things, borrowed from once a great idea of another, made suspiciously cheaply, marketed and sold on Amazon that then breaks and falls apart at the first drop, bang, or trip-up! I'm not one to normally judge too harshly, but IT"S A LOCK! *MEANT TO SECURE YOUR BIKE!* THAT LITERALLY BREAKS IF IT IS TOUCHED BY ANYTHING HEAVIER THEN A FLY!! To say that there a problem with constustrion here is a massive understatement.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is made of cheap porous white metal. I forgot it was installed. When I rolled my Harley back to get it out of the garage, the lock broke into 2 pieces upon contact with the caliper. Batteries do not last long. Not a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: John in Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Alarm function has false alarms. Annoying.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my motorcycle outside, which is parked and untouched. It's been doing the 3 beeps multiple times in the past couple days. And nothing has touched it. It's supposed to mean the batteries are dying, they're brand new. This also did not come with an extra 6pc of batteries like the listing said. When I went to open the battery compartment, the screw stripped and doesn't work now.
customer_reviews.author: josh s

customer_reviews.title: Alarm constantly goes off with zero input – seller ignoring messages
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love to this alarm, but it literally goes off all the time by itself to the point that I just don't use it anymore. Which makes this lock 0% effective. I've sat and stared at it while it triggers itself with zero input, locked on the disk. I've attempted to contact the seller for support before leaving this review, but they have ignored all communication so beware. I know others with the same problem on the same lock.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my motorcycle for the second time . I placed it as described and left motorcycle. I came back and put up kickstand and the bike rolled back about 3-4 inches and broke the lock. I was never contacted by the seller or given a replacement . I would not buy this item or anything else from this seller This is not anti theft . I never heard fro the seller smiles&satisfaction about giving me a refund on this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: richard giannetto

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first week...
customer_reviews.text: Now the alarm is wayyyy too sensitive. For some reason it gets triggered for about 5 minutes after I first activate it. It's quite embarrassing. Last time I was at Venice Beach, I locked my bike and walked away. 30 seconds later it kept blaring and blaring -- for about 5 minutes. It annoys the crap out of my apartment building, so now I only use it in sketchy areas, but I would like to use it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very impressed. It does exactly what it is intended for. Its super easy to install, very loud, and I love the Orange reminder line so I don't forget. its super sensitive, which isnt a bad thing. I put a cover over my bike, so when the wind blows, sometimes it will set off the first alarm which is the 3 beeps. Also, it would be better if it didnt run off 6 watch batters, there definitely room for 2 triple As in there.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that when I went to take the Allen screws out one was so tight that it stripped the hex in the screw. If I didn't need this product right away I would have sent it back. I had to drill the screw out. It's aluminum and it chirps when shook it's not loud enough to hear it inside my house but it's a decent deterrent
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great li'l addition to moto security!
customer_reviews.text: A great li'l deterrent to add to bike security. I will add that it is NOT my only security measure, but it helps primarily because it is really really sensitive to people #@&*'ing round with /near your moto and it can be pretty loud/annoying. I actually deducted a star because I wish it were louder.
customer_reviews.author: Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: Respectable company offers refund
customer_reviews.text: Raised my stars to three. The company was insistent on making my order right without me asking and offered a refund. I accepted and it's respectable. The lock still Won't securely lock a motorcycle. Cast metal broke and it fell off the moment I rolled my motorcycle backwards about a foot. One smack with a small hammer will take it right off. Also, 110decibles has nothing to do with signal strength. Can't hear it from my garage twenty five feet away. Let alone wake me up if someone was stealing my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory s

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and Loud!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't worry about my scooter being safe while parked in St. Louis recently. was down in the city for several days to attend a scooter rally and the scooter stayed safe parked at the house where I was lodging, at shops when I was out shopping and the very loud alarm sure had people out their doors looking when I set it off accidentally where I was staying. It's very affordable, comes with spare batteries, is easy to use and is very easily set off which will really help reduce my scooters from being stolen easily.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Gean

customer_reviews.title: Alarm sensitivity degrades over time.
customer_reviews.text: The alarm function degrades over time. The product came in small box and well packaged. When it first arrived i tested out on my bike and it was very sensitive and loud, I mean it gave warning beeps when i just slightly lifted my helmet from the seat. After couple of weeks, it still beeps pretty loud but thats after shaking it with my hand several times. I thought may be it was the battery but when it beeps it is loud, so i am thinking the alarms sensitivity dies eventually. Lock still works but if you need alarm as vital function, don't expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Han

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected At this Price
customer_reviews.text: Revised review: Had this for about 2 weeks and the batteries were already dying so I rated it lower. I have replaced the batteries and expect this will work better and longer with fresh batteries. The strength of the cricket chirp when you arm it tells you when the batteries are dying/dead. The item is adequate protection since it does alarm when the bike is moved significantly. Does not appear to be overly sensitive in my opinion. With new batteries this thing is ear piercing.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Prevented some jerk from stealing my bike in the city. Heard the beeps from 3 floors up and popped out of bed to witness someone running away from my half uncovered bike. This can be cut but it's all about deterrence, it gave me the couple extra minutes to move my bike to a more secure location. I attach it to the brake rotor right before an area it can hit on the bike. It triggers at the smallest movement. 3 very loud beeps are first and then if continued movement happens it starts the siren which is ear piercing. It beeps whenever I go to remove it just from the key hitting it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Bock

customer_reviews.title: Stop complaining...it's $28! It's a good deal
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a deal for $28. Your getting more than your paying for here. No...it's not perfect but it does what it's supposed to do. It's a theft deterrent...not theft proof. To all you haters.. if you want a real alarm your going to have to pay more. If your in a high risk area, think about coughing up the dough for a monimoto gps. The two together will give you peace of mind and let you sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Another Watch

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my EBIKE
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things you go to buy expecting to love or hate it. It actually works great. Came with batteries already installed and an extra set of batteries so that was nice. Quality-wise, it's heavy and feels tough, not cheap feeling. Not only is the construction great, but the alarm is LOUD. I use this for my ebike. If you bump this thing at all it going to warn you. Another shake of the lock and there goes the alarm... LOUD. This coupled with my U-LOCK, I now dont care where I leave my ebike. Cant beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it'll do the job.. quality control seems questionable.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it on my bike yet (will edit) but from my hands on play with the device it seems to be really loud and we'll constructed. I was excited when I opened the box up and saw two keys and the little pouch that was included. My only gripe so far is that the pouch had what looked to be like mildew on it... Not sure if it was stored in a humid warehouse for a long period of time but it was pretty gross. Also opening up the device itself there's some weird hardend paste all of the inside of the casing.. The device itself looks like it'll do it's job just fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B.

customer_reviews.title: Haywire after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months of using this alarm it has stopped working or shall I say functioning correctly. The alarm goes off & stays ringing! It happened about 10pm the 1st time & it was waking up neighbors on my quiet street, I had to bring it in the house & wrap it in towels. I finally removed the batteries after the 4th attempt to turn off alarm... the lock still works (of course)
customer_reviews.author: Greg Costello

customer_reviews.title: Nice and all good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny small than I expected it but works like giant for my electric scooter ;) But I give you 4 stars bc I think it's too sensitive or maybe weather was too bad? Em last night here in NYC was kinda windy with shattered rains all night long and my disc lock alarming like crazy I feel so bad for my neighbors / other than works great what's over 1.easy to set up 2. With extra batteryis two thumbs up 3. Very strong and nice looking finished material all good good good :) I will recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock. I purchased to serve as a motorcycle alarm and as a reminder to remove my chain before driving off... I dont have a steering lock on my motorcycle so I snap it on the disc brake when I run a brief errand and am not too far from the bike. The alarm is very sensitive and warns would be thefts with three bips at the first vibration. The alarm only goes off if a second movement persists after the warning beeps.
customer_reviews.author: JPT

customer_reviews.title: The review you’ve been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This lock works pretty well. I use it on multiple different toys I have. After you lock it on it will beep three times letting you know it’s ready. Any movement of whatever it is locked onto will make it go off. It’s a pretty loud alarm enough for the neighbors or you to hear if someone’s trying to mess with your stuff. Alarm goes off for about 10 seconds then shuts off and resets. I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I know that this is more of a deterrent than anything else, but it makes me feel better leaving my bike out in the parking lot at work. The alarm goes off with any movement of the steer tire where I have the lock. I added my own cord to link it to my handle bars to remind me to remove it. The alarm is not super loud, but enough to scare most thieves away. Hopefully the batteries are easy enough to change.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Appears well made and works well on my Iron 883. Comes with a small bag and orange reminder cord (sometimes extra $) which easily fits in my swing arm bag. Alarm is sensitive as others have noted so I removed the batteries to deactivate as I don’t need it in my situation. Good price and it does what it needs to temporarily/quickly secure my bike on quick runs away from the bike. Does what it needs to do to temporarily secure and very convenient to carry and use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Super loud!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it should hopefully scare someone away. Unless they are dumb or just don't care. At that point you just have to hope you are not far away or someone calls the police.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Solid little lock, but...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The sound is loud e ough to alert anyone in the immediate area and draw attention to a would be theif. But it's not loud enough to get my attention when I'm inside, which is okay. I dont think any theif wants to deal with that. What I dont like is that even a light rain sets it off repeatedly. Very frustrating because when it's raining my bike doesn't have an alarm and there aren't any pedestrians to scare off a would be theif!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Chinese trash don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Haha broke on first use. My roommate tried to moved my bike and this thing broke off immediately. Not only did it break and fall off, it didn’t make a sound. Even if it did make a sound, it’s not like it’s a deterrent. My cell phone is louder than this thing. Don’t waste your money. This thing is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This lock is VERY loud, if someone touches it you will know. Would be great for when you are storing your scooter/motorcycle in a grage for the winter. Cons: Did not fit my scooter. The lock is extremely sensitive, it goes off if you barely touch it. I was afraid the wind would set it off and annoy my neighbors all the time. The only way to turn the alarm off is to unlock it with the key, if there was a remote I may have kept it.Too sensitive for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: kapplejack

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Too paranoid to try the alarm feature on the bike (neighbors might get mad if it's too sensitive like the other reviews indicated..) but in every other way it has been great. I keep the keys on my motorcycle keychain and the orange cord reminds me never to try and move the bike without removing it. Will probably get another one for the rear wheel in the future but it may not be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Megadime

customer_reviews.title: Loud and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great and loud alarm, I love the warning feature where if the bike is touched (moved) the alarm will do 3 warning beeps and if the bike keeps moving ill sound the alarm for 30 seconds. It's easy to install, and comes with an extra battery. I keep it in my rear seat and always put the lock on whenever I get off. I bought mine before they started offering the Orange cable so it sucks but otherwise if you do forget you have the alarm on when you sit on the bike it'll beep and remind you that it's on basically.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Jammed/broke after two months
customer_reviews.text: The lock worked well for about two months. I only used it in dry conditions as I park in a garage and don’t ride in the rain (Los Angeles has very few rainy days throughout the year). One day the lock cylinders jammed up and I couldn’t get the lock off of my disc. After using WD-40 to hopefully loosen it up and failing, I called a locksmith who was only able to cut the lock off. Save yourself the time and money by spending a little more for a better lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive insurance against thieves
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm I use it every time I park my motorcycle very easy to use just don't forget to remove before you take off but with the bright orange cord that goes from the alarm to your handlebar you should not forget I use a couple other locks and alarms together with this break disc alarm very inexpensive considering the price of your motorcycle they already stole my motorcycle one time trying not to let it happen again
customer_reviews.author: junior

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to remove screws for the batteries
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and tried to remove the batteries. The screws were extremely tight and the provided tiny allen wrench did nothing. I used my own allen wrench and wasted over an hour and was only able to remove 3 of them. The 4th was stuck and I think the screw broke. No clue why they provide such a tiny allen wrench when the machine that screws them in are so much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Not as sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: So I had the previous version for a while and sold it with my bike. I thought this one would be the same but I don’t like it as much. It’s not very sensitive, I can cover and uncover my bike without it going off. I wish it had an option to lock the bike without engaging the alarm. Otherwise pretty good
customer_reviews.author: IPR

customer_reviews.title: Touchy
customer_reviews.text: Probably works a little too well. Every time we get a strong enough wind to rock the bike, it goes off. I’m sure my neighbors hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa B.

customer_reviews.title: a great peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: i purchased 2 of these for r6 and a busa. they work as advertised. along with other securities for the bikes i think i got a great deal. i highly recommend these items just for the added security and peace of mind.. if your working on bike and alarm is on. it will go off if bike is moved. for the accidental alarms, amazon has great deal for replacement batteries for these items. got them on order also. thanks
customer_reviews.author: james kirkendoll

customer_reviews.title: Great brake rotor lock with alarm.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, even the stupid strap. I remember the days of trying to drive off with my bike lock still on the brake rotor. Well that is gone. Because you can't miss the orange lead as long as you use it. My only negative is it is not very loud. Everything else is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great lock as far as I can tell
customer_reviews.text: I like the lock. It is not too sensitive, I can touch the lock without more than a warning chirp, but if I continue then the siren goes off. It is a high pitched, easy to hear siren. This coupled with the alarm built into my motorcycle make for a great combination.
customer_reviews.author: Armand

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, but one issue
customer_reviews.text: Its a standard brake lock with an alarm. But the annoying part is that it beeps every time you go unlock it. You don't even need to touch the lock with the key -- as long as the key gets close, the lock gives a beep. If you don't unlock it quick enough, the alarm will go off.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: No one is moving your bike without this thing going off.
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost. This is sensitive, I go to put the key in while it is on the disc and it will trigger the alarm. The build looks sturdy enough, I really doubt anyone will break it. Its more of a baked on charcoal finish, not matte black as I had hoped. The alarm is noticeable but not as deafeningly loud as you would hope. I was next to it trying to unlock it for a good ten seconds and it was tolerable. (I put the lock in a very weird position). totally worth the twenty bucks however.
customer_reviews.author: Bloop

customer_reviews.title: Lock works fine, but the alarm is way too sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is great mechanically and feels very sturdy, but the alarm is so sensitive that it goes off instantly when I try to unlock it. The initial chirp to warn is too short and it immediately starts going off when I stick the key in.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia JC

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitive, not that loud
customer_reviews.text: The few times I used this it would go off while unlocking it, and when it did it wasn't THAT loud. The main reason it's getting 2 stars is that it's so sensitive that it was going off in a rain storm while the bike was covered. Unfortunately I was out of town but my neighbor let me know it was going off all night long! Super embarrassing, I'm taking the batteries out and will use it as a regular disc lock now.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Loud, Well Made Lock that is Visibly Unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Initial Impressions are great, very impressed with the fit and finish of the lock. Feels Sturdy when Handled and Locks / Unlocks easy enough. The Lock is fairly sensitive to movements of the bike, however is not so sensitive that it prevents being unlocked. That being said, on an Icy Chicago Evening, fiddling with the Key in the dark did set the alarm off, after first hearing a 3 beep tone removing Ice from the bike. I'm fairly confident that if someone touches your bike with enough force to move the suspension visibly, then the alarm is going to register the contact. The sound is a bit overwhelming, so we'll see what this means in reality,
customer_reviews.author: dustin benedict

customer_reviews.title: Works great on Ninja 400
customer_reviews.text: I pop it on my Ninja 400 at work or anywhere else outside my garage. Works like a champ and puts my mind at ease when leaving it in public out of sight. It attaches to front or rear wheel and the motion function works as expected. I haven’t had the alarm go off unless I’m rocking or rolling my bike causing movement. I feel it will discourage or prevent a theft or vandalism because of the warning and alarm trigger. For the price it is definitely worth it. It also came with a spare set of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Number1Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Solid product and the sound is loud enough to draw public attention and scare bad guys. Not too sensitive as other reviews said ...
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I owned it for a week i feel this is a product i'm looking for. Solid product and the sound is loud enough to draw public attention and scare bad guys. Not too sensitive as other reviews said (personal experience). Three beeps of warning for the first vibration and if the vibration continues a long noisy sound will be activated. Overall, i'm satisfied with this product. Price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Lambrusco

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I like this lock for my motorcycle. It works with my 2000 Suzuki gz250 I love the reminder cord. I did take the batteries out because I have another alarm that works better. Makes me feel a lot better leaving my motorcycle overnight or for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Piper Mock

customer_reviews.title: DOPE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! I live in an apartment complex on a not very good part of town and with this thing on and my bike cover I don’t have to worry about a thing. Highly sensitive, if you even shake the bike a little it will give it’s warning sound. The only thing is I wish it was a little bit louder, given it’s already pretty loud. But it would be hard to hear if I was inside with the tv on or something. Regardless definitely worth it if you’re not trying to deal with bike chains or finding a post to lock it to. Also extremely easy to use, would definitely get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Heathleo

customer_reviews.title: I lover this.
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is not as loud as I expected. But it will do the job. It works perfectly. The sensitivity is just right. And it is heavier and more durable than expected. Fits my Honda VFR1200X like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Fossibilities

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money all day
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a couple weeks, so far so good. I like it. I also feel it does deter thieves away just because they can see it. No need key to lock it which is convenient , just click it on the disc brake and good to go. Also has a nice weight to it, feels quality. Alarm sound is pretty loud, high pitched enough that you can hear it far away.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Works - reacts when slightly moved, loud
customer_reviews.text: Bought for electric bike to deter. We are locking bike on campus while attending class. It works quite well - warning beeps and loud alarms do go off if you start moving the device, even while unlocking and removing it. Wish orange reminder cord is longer. It will not reach handlebar or seat stem so we thread the U lock into it.
customer_reviews.author: Mango Gummies

customer_reviews.title: pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: It stay on my bike and is sensitive. The lock itself is nothing super special but it is good enough to scare somebody away.
customer_reviews.author: Large Lau

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Good enough as a deterrent but if some one wanted too they could probably just break it off I’m within ear shot of my bike so I would hear the alarm go off and that’s all I need it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works But My Case Was Filthy
customer_reviews.text: The unit locks easy. Unfortunately, the unit I received came with something white all over the black case. I put it on my bike because something is better than nothing. The alarm is ear piercing but the condition of one I received was not good.
customer_reviews.author: Katanajo

customer_reviews.title: Loud and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: thos little lock works better than my car alarm and is very loud I love how any movement to the tire causes it to give a warning beeb and than go off if movement continues well made i feel safe with thos thing on my bike
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works good a little sensitive during storms but at least I know it’s working
customer_reviews.author: michael demanche

customer_reviews.title: Way too sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: While I loved this alarm at first, it is SO sensitive. Even on days when there is no wind it will just randomly start going off without anyone touching the bike. I am very disappointed and don’t even want to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: DJ M

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what my boyfriend needs. It will definitely scare someone off. Once it is locked and set if you bump the bike it will beep 3 times. After that if you bump it again it will alarm for about 10 seconds and so on. The alarm could be louder but it’s definitely loud enough to work and makes a piercing ear sound. I’d definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely loud enough to deter criminals
customer_reviews.text: I personally wish it had a little longer timer before arming for when I put the motorcycle cover on. It arms within 15 seconds. Otherwise it's a decent deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: There aren’t really mean locks on the market that 100% protect your motorcycle, however that been said still better to have something rather than nothing and why not this little bad boy it screams the moment you go near it lol
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Brought my disc lock a few months ago and barely used it. However, I went to lock my bike a few days ago and the lock just fell apart. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and works well
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and works well. Just one hiccup maybe. While parked in my house a vibration in the kitchen (frozen pack of bacon fell to the tile from the freezer) and it set off the alarm on the bike in the living room. I just wonder if traffic or other vibrations from the street will be too touchy for it or if the sensitivity is adjustable because it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for your bike
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a great lock for my bike. It locks easily and unlocks with ease. My only problem is that the alarm is sometimes sensitive and other times not. I'll jiggle the bike only a little and the alarm will go off. Other times, after engaging the lock for an hour, I will completely hop on the bike and the alarm won't sound. Otherwise, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I don’t expect this to keep a thief that really wants to cut it from cutting it but the motion sensor works well, it’s loud and appears well made. Even comes with extra batteries. Great deal for $30
customer_reviews.author: kda640

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this product, the alarm triggers off randomly and the alloy used to build the lock seems to be very weak. Just buy holding the lock in your hand you can tell this lock will not resist any attack.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: Great for older bikes without fork locks
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive, easy to use. One wish was that it was painted a brighter color, a more visible deterrent. However, it has been a great peace of mind. Hopefully the next generation will have some sort of cell phone notification, but for the price, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Theriot

customer_reviews.title: Great as a lock but that’s it
customer_reviews.text: The disk brake lock works as a lock. That’s about it. It wasn’t water resistant at all, batteries were covered in acid. The alarm is useless, my tv is louder. This lock has to be cheap junk or defective. Will be returning if there’s no restocking fees or shipping.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Suprised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this thing cant be beat!! Alarm is much louder then I expected, I would recommend to anyone looking for a little more piece of mind. Not saying your Bike wont get stolen but this is definitely a good deterrent especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Moore

customer_reviews.title: loud sensitive
customer_reviews.text: i love this lock . the only thing is that i think the sensitivity on this lock is too sensitive. it'll go off after 15sec. of locking it and its AM6:10 at a hotel so yea haha sorry peeps. other than that it does its job
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the four months I used it before totaling my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a serious piece of theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: For a motorcycle this is probably flawless. However for a bicycle I would give this a 4/5 because in the scenario that someone might hit your bike locking or unlocking their bike the alarm would be relentless and super easily triggered. However for any one scenario where there is no excuse they should ever touch the bike, it is awesome. It's probably larger than you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Philly5.56

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Its an alarm and lock in one.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It doesnt have a remote control which is nice. The keys deactivate the alarm when you unlock it. It takes 6 watch batteries. AND 12 ARE INCLUDED. Pretty loud too.
customer_reviews.author: JON

customer_reviews.title: Ear pearcing
customer_reviews.text: Want to really keep people away from your bike? It takes a little used to getting the lock on/off without setting it off, but it will definitely deter any would be thief. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as sensitive as most posts say but it looks as good or even better for the more price products sold in stores. I tasted it and works perfectly but I never got it wet like some said that could affect the alarm. Now my bike is protected!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great device, great price, and loud enough to hear from the street
customer_reviews.text: This literally saved me this morning (5/15/2020). A few idiots tried to steal my motorcycle l, but where thwarted by the alarm. It was loud enough for me to hear as well (I have off street parking). Note: you might want to use this AND a cover for added sensitivity and security.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Used this lock on my DRZ when I put it in storage. The locking mechanism is very solid and even withstood the brutal Ohio winter we had this year. It can be a bit touchy at first, but I feel as though it got used to the gusts of winds we got because it began to have less false alarms the more I used it. Would definitely recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Lousy motion sensor
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and for the most part and motion detection part of the lock is supposed to be good. I literally have to whack the Lock to get the alarm to go off. it is not sensitive at all. Even after rolling the bike and shaking the handlebars it still won't go off. Came neatly packed in a little box that was put in a larger box with no padding to keep it from bouncing around in the Box. At this point it's just a fancy lock for my disc brakes. I am quite disappointed at how lousy the motion sensor is. Was going to buy another one for my other bike but I will be looking elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Works good for a couple of weeks maybe a month not for long time storage
customer_reviews.text: After a couple weeks key started to get jammed now it’s stuck on my motorcycle and at first the key wouldn’t go in then I wiggled it around and it finally went it but when I turn it it doesn’t unlock it and it’s stuck on my bike now I have to figure out a way to cut it off smh don’t go cheap.
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: this little lock works great. if my bike gets bumped it chirps a ...
customer_reviews.text: this little lock works great. if my bike gets bumped it chirps a couple of times as a warning .If it still is messed with it goes off . its pretty loud, loud enough to drawl attention and cause the person messing with it to panic . together with my other security devices i use .it makes my bike that much harder to steel.I would recommend it for simple ,easy added security .
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work for my 2007 Vespa
customer_reviews.text: The product was just fine. The fact that it came with a reminder cable so you dont drive off with it on your disc is nice as well. The BIGGEST problem was that the disc on the vespa sits too close to the wheel for the lock to slide onto the disc. Therefore i couldnt even use it. Just a heads up for other vespa riders.
customer_reviews.author: BruceAllen

customer_reviews.title: Alarm isn't the loudest but a great deterrent. I use 3 different devices to secure ...
customer_reviews.text: Alarm isn't the loudest but a great deterrent. I use 3 different devices to secure my bike. Disc Alarm, Trimax chain and the BigPantha Brake/Clutch lock. All of these devices lowered my motorcycle insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Corey W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: This product gives me wonderful peace of mind, since I ride to work in a part of downtown where there's lots of loitering and tom-foolery. The motion detection seems fairly insensitive, but it'll work if someone's trying to take off with my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its important to know that it does its purpose and have sensitivity on motion.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock with alarm its very practical to have it for my e-bike. I’m sure the thief will be scared away once the alarm went off. I dislike of not putting a rubber seal around its cover.
customer_reviews.author: mel agustin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. We keep our bikes locked up while we are camping but that doesn't stop everyone. Now with this and locks we have a little heads up if someone is trying to move or take our motorcycles. Just trying to keep honest men honest lol its been a month and battery is still going.
customer_reviews.author: Kellz

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: This device has a very inconsistent threshold of detecting motion. Sometimes a slight movement would cause the alarm and other times I could get on my bike, straighten it, and rock without any alarm. Additionally, I forgot to take it off one time and the metal bent while the whole unit cracked upon hitting the break disc at a roll, showing it’s extremely weak. At least it was the device and not my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but once you start using it
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but once you start using it, you can't take the key out without the making the alarm sound. May be I need to try different way.. Its worth the money though.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and portable lock. Pretty loud. Works on the back wheel disc. Easy to lock and unlock once you get used to lining it up. Nice other layer of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Lock is great and have had only 1 problem
customer_reviews.text: Lock is great and have had only 1 problem: If I've been riding in the city and want to stop, the heat from the brake rotor will set off the disk lock alarm. Have to wait about 5 mins for it to cool enuff to use. Otherwise this thing is great! Especially if your fork lock doesnt function.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great lock to use and it doesn't take much to use it and its really sensitive to motion so if anything messed with my bike I know for sure it would g ok off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is too sensitive and when someone DID try to steal my bike, they just took off on it and the lock broke off. It did not stop the bike from rolling at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it wet, will no longer function.
customer_reviews.text: Was a good product until I had it on my bike at work in a very light shower now it's unfortunately no longer functioning and I had to take out the batteries to stop it from making crazy noises. I mean you can't really even get a normal disclock at this price so can't complain that much. Don't let it get wet at all, I'm assuming this is what happened, even with new batteries it will not function. Seeing as it doesn't list being waterproof I see this as my fault even though it was only a light shower.
customer_reviews.author: KCR1990

customer_reviews.title: Great  Deterrent !!
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, loud alarm Will deter a thief especially if people are around. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: bpt

product_meta.title: YOHOOLYO Disc Lock Alarm Motorcycle Alarm Padlock with 110db Alarm Sound for Motorcycles Bicycles
feature_bullets: The Anti Theft Lock is made entirely of metal, it is sturdy and durable
The alarm sound is able to reach to 110 db, the measure of the locking pin 7 mm that allows us to set at 360 degrees, and it is possible to fix it in any position
It comes with two keys, it is ideal for motorcycles, bicycles, scooters and any vehicle where there are holes or spokes on a wheel
Motion sensor with 5 seconds delay and rust-resistant, weather-resistant, resistant to destroy physical and waterproof
The package is included 1 motorcycle Disc Lock 2 keys and 1 allen key ,you can use the supplied allen key to unscrew the 4 screws in the back of our lock

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,544 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
